shared PARAMETER__YEAR = let
  Source = PostgreSQL.Database("aws-0-eu-central-1.pooler.supabase.com", "postgres"),
  #"Navigation 1" = Source{[Schema = "POWER_QUERY_EXERCISES", Item = "HELPER_TABLE__PARAMETERS"]}[Data],

  #"Changed column type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Removed other columns", {{"PARAMETER__YEAR", type text}}),
  Custom = Table.ToList(#"Changed column type")
in
  Custom;
shared Year = 2022 meta [IsParameterQuery = true, IsParameterQueryRequired = true, Type = type number, ExpressionIdentifier = PARAMETER__YEAR];
shared #"Table affected by parameters" = let
  Source = PostgreSQL.Database("aws-0-eu-central-1.pooler.supabase.com", "postgres"),

shared Schema = "THE_OTHER_POWER_QUERY_EXERCISES" meta [IsParameterQuery = true, IsParameterQueryRequired = true, Type = type text, List = {"THE_OTHER_POWER_QUERY_EXERCISES", "POWER_QUERY_EXERCISES"}];
shared a_user_defined_function = (TEXT_PARAMETER as text, NUMERIC_PARAMETER as number) as text => 
let
  result = "TEXT_PARAMETER=" & TEXT_PARAMETER & "; NUMERIC_PARAMTER=" & Text.From(NUMERIC_PARAMETER)
in
  result;

  Source = PostgreSQL.Database("aws-0-eu-central-1.pooler.supabase.com", "postgres"),

  #"Added custom" = Table.AddColumn(#"Replaced value", "2023_YTD", each [2022_YTD] + .25 * [2022_YTD]),
  #"Renamed columns 1" = Table.RenameColumns(#"Added custom", {{"2022_YTD", "2022_EOY"}}),
  #"Unpivoted other columns" = Table.UnpivotOtherColumns(#"Renamed columns 1", {"ID"}, "Attribute", "Value"),
  #"Transform columns" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Unpivoted other columns", {{"Value", type text}}),
